name: NSAnimation.BlockingMode
desc: These constants indicate the blocking mode of an NSAnimation object when it is running.

items.name: case blocking
items.desc: Requests the animation to run in the main thread in a custom run-loop mode that blocks user input.

items.name: case nonblocking
items.desc: Requests the animation to run in a standard or specified run-loop mode that allows user input.

items.name: case nonblockingThreaded
items.desc: Requests the animation to run in a separate thread that is spawned by the NSAnimation object.
